https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/avaEwdO8SOu2lKnzWdxvYGvRC2I.jpg Romanced by a charismatic professor, a college girl quits school to run away with and marry him. While her mother tries to convince her to come home, she slowly learns that he is a controlling husband with a shady past... and soon realizes that if she were to leave him he would kill her. Deadly Lessons
